reviewText: Love these older cartoons. Snuffy Smith has so much character and uniqueness. Nothing like the garbage they've been making for years. They are so generic and stupid. The older the cartoons, the better, especially the artwork.

As a Prime member, I have enjoyed watching these wonderful nostalgic cartoon classics. They bring back fond memories of my youth. Thanks Amazon, for making them available. So what if they are not politically correct today.
I got this for my husband, but it doesn't work--it skips!

I remember going to the movies and you always saw a cartoon before the show.  I always wondered what ever happened to the cartoons about Snuffy Smith for he was one of my favorites.  I looked him up on Amazon and there he was so ordered the tape and now I can show the great grandkids the good cartoons instead of these they have today!!!
